channel.title: [Help] Need help :(
channel.description:
Hey, i just started to make my own server but i'm a noob in that kind off things i read some stickies and topics but i cant figur out some things so i have some questions :
1 -> How do i make a moparscape server? when i start moparscape and press make server my server starts only everyone who logs in is mod cant edit things only Npc's and items :( Help
2 -> when i set a npc on my nub server then i fight whit i only have to hit 0 and it dies how to change that:S
3 -> what programs i need to make a server cause i only use moparscape.. More questions will be added
4 -> if i press start server everyone is mod how can i be the only mod ?
